name: Carrot Cake Chia Pudding. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe
description: Easy Carrot Cake Chia Pudding with roasted carrots, spices, walnuts and chia seeds.
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp or more gf oats  (or hemp seeds or walnuts)
1 cup almond milk  (or non dairy milk.)
1.5 Tbsp Chia seeds  (Add 2 or 3 Tbsp for a more jelly like pudding.)

recipeInstructions.text: Process the carrots and oats or nuts in a processor. Or grate the carrots. About 3/4 loaded cup grated carrots and oats/nuts.
recipeInstructions.name: Process the carrots and oats or nuts in a processor. Or grate the carrots. About 3/4 loaded cup grated carrots and oats/nuts.

recipeInstructions.text: In pan, add the carrot mixture, spices and maple and cook on medium heat for 5 to 7 minutes or until slightly dry.
recipeInstructions.name: In pan, add the carrot mixture, spices and maple and cook on medium heat for 5 to 7 minutes or until slightly dry.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the water, vanilla, almond milk and mix. Taste and add more sugar, stevia or maple to taste. Mix in the chia seeds. Cover and let sit in the refrigerator for a few hours or overnight.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the water, vanilla, almond milk and mix. Taste and add more sugar, stevia or maple to taste. Mix in the chia seeds. Cover and let sit in the refrigerator for a few hours or overnight.

recipeInstructions.text: Add carrot curls(made with a vegetable peeler) and candied walnuts for a prettier looking pudding. (imagine them in the pictures:) Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Add carrot curls(made with a vegetable peeler) and candied walnuts for a prettier looking pudding. (imagine them in the pictures:) Enjoy!
